video.title: Hard Time
video.synopsis: Go behind bars at a maximum-security prison in this gritty documentary series chronicling a year in the life of the facility's wardens and inmates.

episodes.synopsis: New inmates and correctional officer cadets embark on a year-long journey behind bars in the treacherous world of Georgia's maximum-security prisons.
episodes.title: Breaking In

episodes.synopsis: Inmates in one of Georgia's highest-security prisons deal with violence, manhood and deciding what to do with their time while living behind bars.
episodes.title: The Ropes

episodes.synopsis: When inmates and officers clash, the paramilitary system flexes its muscle to maintain control and enforce rules at one of Georgia's toughest prisons.
episodes.title: Tools of Control

episodes.synopsis: Doing time in a world this extreme can change anyone, as proved by inmates "Yankee" and Elliot, who undergo radical alterations behind bars.
episodes.title: Changes Behind Bars

episodes.synopsis: Inmate Erick Golphin has assaulted a correctional officer. He will go to Hi-Max -- the most extreme prison environment allowed under American law.
episodes.title: Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: Every element at Hays State Prison feeds one central purpose: keep convicted and dangerous felons inside. When all fails, two inmates make their move.
episodes.title: Breakout
